title: Attendance
content: Just wanted to know if anyone got into any sort of trouble for having attendance between 70-75 in the recent past (like last sem or last to last one).

comments.body: Usually, there are consequences. I remember seeing a couple of posts about remedial classes last semester. So there probably were at least a few kids who had to attend extra classes to cover attendance gaps.

Yup, I had shortage of attendence prev sem. 68-73.
They will make you to sit for remedial in a classroom . 4 days I think, they'll take sign for each session you attend.
how much do they increase your % by for the 4 classes?
Donno, but I think until remedial attendence compensates shortages. For all sub.
But this SEM teachers were telling that there will be no such remedial classes.You should attend classes in order to maintain an attendance of 75%.
